item.title: Where the money goes -- Tracking funds and bringing club publicity to LAHS
item.description: [Note for Readers] Mica will be placing a personal statement in this article about some of the applications/challenges of this project! Stay tuned Link to repository: https://github.com/MicaHorton/STEAM-Repository
